Title: Liebherr supplies R290 HVAC systems for Swiss trains
Summary: SWITZERLAND: Liebherr-Transportation Systems is to supply propane-based HVAC systems to Swiss train manufacturer Stadler Bussnang for integration in 16 battery electric multiple unit FLIRT trains.

Title: Martinko honoured by the Chemists’ Club
Summary: USA: Joseph Martinko, Chemours’ president of thermal and specialised solutions, has been awarded the 2025 Winthrop-Sears Medal by The Chemists’ Club.

Title: Lowe to offer Pastorfrigor cases in US
Summary: USA: Lowe Rental, the UK-headquartered global commercial refrigeration and catering equipment solutions provider, will now be distributing Pastorfrigor refrigeration cases to the US grocery and retail market.

Title: Nearly half of MPs back cutting electricity levies
Summary: UK: A survey of British MPs has revealed that 36% have little knowledge of the Boiler Upgrade Scheme (BUS), but 48% would support the removal of levies from electricity.

Title: BESA training supports heat network regime
Summary: UK: The Building Engineering Services Association (BESA) has launched the first official training course supporting the UK government’s Heat Network Technical Assurance Scheme (HNTAS).
